          <title>
            <string language="en">House insulations</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hausisolierungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Isolations de Chambre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Isolações da casa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Isolamenti della Camera</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μονώσεις σπιτιών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aislantes de la casa</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This figure shows the different ways to insulate a house to avoid wasting energy in heating and cooling the house.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heating</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">insulation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">energy transfer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">house insulation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">internal energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die unterschiedlichen 
Methoden, ein Haus zu isolieren, um Abfallenergie in der Heizung und 
im Abkühlen des Hauses zu vermeiden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette figure montre les différentes voies 
d'isoler une maison pour éviter l'énergie de gaspillage dans le 
chauffage et refroidissement de la maison.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta figura mostra as maneiras diferentes isolar 
uma casa para evitar a energia desperdiçando no heating e em 
refrigerar a casa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa figura mostra i modi differenti isolare una
casa per evitare l'energia sprecante nel heating e nel raffreddamento 
della casa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτός ο αριθμός εμφανίζει διαφορετικούς τρόπους να 
μονωθεί ένα σπίτι για να αποφύγει την ενέργεια στη θέρμανση και 
την ψύξη του σπιτιού.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta figura muestra las diversas maneras de aislar
una casa para evitar energía que pierde en la calefacción y 
refrescar la casa.</string>
          </description>
